Text: Maelstrom! My man! Thank you for putting these up. I missed your Scientific American uploads since they stopped back in May or so. Keep up the good work, and here's to more Scientific American!!!
Now I cam stop stealing ScAMs from my library.  :D
thanks for sharing your treasures of knowledge!
These are brilliant Malestrom (and all your other torrents) - thank you for putting all these up. Will you be putting up any Scientific American Mind from 2011?

Hey,

Just a word of caution: the actual files are misnamed.  When you download them the all say "2011", but they are actually 2010.

Cheers =)
